member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions
member.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and CoreGraphics types.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCGColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a CoreGraphics color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCIColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a CoreImage color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToNSData(SkiaSharp.SKData)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp data object into a NSData.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the data as a NSData.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.AppleExtensions.ToPoint(SkiaSharp.SKPoint)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp point into a CoreGraphics point.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp rectangle into a CoreGraphics rectangle.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.MacExtensions

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into an AppKit color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.MacExtensions.ToNSImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a AppKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a AppKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.MacExtensions.ToNSImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a AppKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a AppKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.MacExtensions.ToNSImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a AppKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a AppKit image.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a AppKit image.

member.summary: Converts a AppKit image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a AppKit image.
member.returns: Returns if the copy was successful, otherwise .

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer
member.summary: A CoreAnimation layer that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer
member.summary: Default constructor that initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: To be added.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.DrawInContext(CoreGraphics.CGContext)
member.param: The prepared context to draw into.
member.summary: Draws the layer on the specified context.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.DrawInSurface(SkiaSharp.SKSurface,SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo)
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

remarks.para: There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the method, or by attaching a handler to the event. If the method is overridden, then the base must be called.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.IgnorePixelScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawing canvas should be resized on high resolution displays.
member.remarks: By default, when false, the canvas is resized to 1 canvas pixel per display pixel. When true, the canvas is resized to device independent pixels, and then stretched to fill the view. Although performance is improved and all objects are the same size on different display densities, blurring and pixelation may occur.

member.name: E:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.PaintSurface
member.summary: Occurs when the the canvas needs to be redrawn.

remarks.para: There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the method, or by attaching a handler to the event.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasLayer.SKDelegate
member.summary: Gets or sets the layer's delegate object.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView
member.summary: A view that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView
member.summary: Default constructor that initializes a new instance of .

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView(CoreGraphics.CGRect)
member.param: The frame used by the view.
member.summary: Initializes the with the specified frame.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView(System.IntPtr)
member.param: The pointer (handle) to the unmanaged object.
member.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of unmanaged objects; Called by the runtime.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.AwakeFromNib
member.summary: Called after the object has been loaded from the nib file. Overriders must call the base method.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: To be added.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.DrawInSurface(SkiaSharp.SKSurface,SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo)
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

remarks.para: There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the method, or by attaching a handler to the event. If the method is overridden, then the base must be called.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.DrawRect(CoreGraphics.CGRect)
member.summary: Draws the view within the passed-in rectangle.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.IgnorePixelScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawing canvas should be resized on high resolution displays.
member.remarks: By default, when false, the canvas is resized to 1 canvas pixel per display pixel. When true, the canvas is resized to device independent pixels, and then stretched to fill the view. Although performance is improved and all objects are the same size on different display densities, blurring and pixelation may occur.

member.name: E:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKCanvasView.PaintSurface
member.summary: Occurs when the the canvas needs to be redrawn.

remarks.para: There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the method, or by attaching a handler to the event.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer
member.summary: A CoreAnimation OpenGL layer that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer
member.summary: Default constructor that initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.DrawInCGLContext(OpenGL.CGLContext,OpenGL.CGLPixelFormat,System.Double,CoreVideo.CVTimeStamp)
member.param: The rendering context in to which the OpenGL content should be rendered.
The pixel format used when the context was created.
The display timestamp associated with the time interval. Can be null.
member.summary: Draws the OpenGL content for the specified time.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.DrawInSurface(SkiaSharp.SKSurface,SkiaSharp.GRBackendRenderTargetDesc)
member.param: The render target that is currently being drawn.
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

remarks.para: There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the method, or by attaching a handler to the event. If the method is overridden, then the base must be called.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.GRContext
member.summary: Gets the current GPU context.

member.name: E:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.PaintSurface
member.summary: Occurs when the the canvas needs to be redrawn.

remarks.para: There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the method, or by attaching a handler to the event.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.Release(OpenGL.CGLContext)
member.summary: Releases the specified rendering context.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.SKGLLayer.SKDelegate
member.summary: Gets or sets the layer's delegate object.
